title: Old News: AC/DC Guitarist and Co-Founder Malcolm Young Died... In 2017 | Lead Stories
subtitle: Did Malcom Young, the guitarist and co-founder of the band AC/DC, pass away? Yes he did... in 2017. News of...
author: leadstories.com
vclaim:
Did Malcom Young, the guitarist and co-founder of the band AC/DC, pass away? Yes he did... in 2017. News of his death went viral again in 2018 around the one-year anniversary of his passing. He is indeed dead but it is old news.

The story being shared around widely again is an article published on November 18, 2017 titled "Malcolm Young, AC/DC Guitarist and Co-Founder, Dead at 64" (archived here) which opened:

Users on social media only saw this title, description and thumbnail so they would not have seen any indication it happened last year:

Here are some people sharing the news as if it was something that happened recently:
